name: Water Cannon Guy
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam. Take care of your hygiene shooting water to dirty hands!

Use the mouse to direct the water and the WASD or arrow keys to move. 

If you cannot move, click the screen first!!

If you find a bug or have any suggestion, leave it in the comments! 

  • Art: Cram
  • Music: call_me_ori
  • Programming: Slimy Studios
